data.actual_result: When clicking Save nothing changes. And when clicking Reset it doesnt change your picture back to the old one, leaving you with a low res server icon.
data.expected_result: if you click Save, it should display an error as the image is smaller than it should. If you click reset it should revert back to the old picture
data.short_description: Able to set server pictures smaller than the required minimum
data.steps_to_repro: - Upload a picture smaller than 128² (I did it with 16x16 icons) - Click either Save Changes or Reset
